text: Ludovic Martin (born 25 October 1983) is a Swiss trampoline gymnast. He represented Switzerland at the 2004 Summer Olympics in Athens, Greece in the men's trampoline event. He finished in 9th place in the qualification round. In 2005 he won the silver medal in the men's synchro event at the 2005 Trampoline World Championships in Eindhoven, Netherlands. At the 2007 Trampoline World Championships in Quebec, Canada he won the bronze medal in this event. He worked in accounting for some time and in September 2008 he joined Cirque du Soleil. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Swiss male trampolinists Category:Olympic gymnasts of Switzerland Category:Gymnasts at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the Trampoline Gymnastics World Championships Category:Cirque du Soleil performers
title: Ludovic Martin (gymnast)
